Header.nativeAppBeforeLogin.Content: Betly Sportsbook requires you to install the app before placing any bets.
Footer.working_hours_line2: Opens daily at 6:30am and closes at 5:30am
Footer.working_hours_line4: Opens daily at 8:45am and closes at 5:45am
Footer.responsible: Must be 21+ and located in West Virginia to bet. All sports wagers regulated by the West Virginia Lottery. Please play responsibly. If you or someone you know has a problem with gambling, call 1-800-GAMBLER (1-800-426-8537). Assistance is also available by calling or texting 1-800-522-4700, chatting online via http://www.ncpgambling.org/help-treatment/chat or visiting the National Council on Problem Gambling Services website at http://www.ncpgambling.org/. Information, resources, counseling and referral services can be accessed 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Visit our responsible Gaming page to learn more
softGeolocationRedirect.infoMessage.Text: It looks like you're in West Virginia. If this is correct, continue to get started.
hardGeolocationRedirect.infoMessage.Fail: It looks like you're in New Jersey. If this is correct, continue to get started.
It looks like you're in Iowa. If this is correct, continue to get started.
It looks like you're in Nevada. If this is correct, continue to get started.
It looks like you're not in West Virginia. If this is correct, continue to get redirected to New Jersey website.

Header.nativeAppAfterLogin.Content: You are now logged into Sportsbook; however, you cannot make wagers unless you download the app
appInstaller.s2.step2: Pull down your notification panel from the top screen and tap on Betly Sportsbook app.
appInstaller.nativeAppios.shouldDwn: You may still use the Website to browse and track active or settled bets; however, if you want to place wagers or Cash Out then download the app and be located in NJ to play.
Account.PlayLimits.Dialog.Success.Text: Limit set has been completed successfully.
Promotions.AccountPage.InfoText: Betly is about to get even better. We are working hard on some awesome promotions for you. Until then, enjoy all the easy action sports betting Betly has to offer.

Account.Join.ScanDriversLicenseDesc: Scan your Driver's License or State ID to populate the registration fields.

Transaction.Sightline.EnrollmentNotCompl: You first need to complete enrollment process with Betly Play+ in order to enable this operation.
Transaction.Sightline.Withdraw.Title: Betly Play+
Transaction.Sightline.Withdraw.Descripti: Withdraw funds from Mardi Gras to Betly Play+

Transaction.Sightline.Enroll.Note1: Verifying your Betly Play+ instruction for transactions, please wait...
Transaction.Sightline.Enroll.Note5:
• Enroll in Betly Play+ today
  • Fund with your Credit or Debit Card, Pay With My Bank, or PayPal
  • Fast Deposits and Cash-Outs
  • Receive your physical Betly Play+ prepaid card in as little as 10-14 days
  • Use everywhere Discover® is accepted
Transaction.Sightline.Funding.Title: Fund your Betly Play+ account
Transaction.Sightline.Funding.Note1:
• Step 1: Click Fund Play+ to add funds to your Play+ account with a Credit or Debit Card, Pay With My Bank, or PayPal.
  • Step 2: Transfer from Play+ to Mardi Gras by clicking Deposit in the Cashier.
